description:
There are 2.7 billion employees worldwide who don’t sit behind a desk.

When it comes to implementing hardware and software to accommodate their needs, employers have lagged behind.

Paul will share why the Mobile Practice at Equal Experts believes now is the time for enterprises to invest in the non-office workforce and why it makes business sense to give these workers modern tools and technology.

>>>Followed By:>>>>

Virtual Fishbowl session where all attendees will have a chance take part in a discussion on how Mobile can make work more engaging and productive

SPEAKER:
Paul Stringer: Enterprise Mobile Practice Lead, Equal Experts
title: A mobile workforce requires mobile solutions (now more than ever)
